wikipedia_page.main:
Dame Sarah Jane Macintyre  (born 1949), known as Sally Macintyre, is a Scottish medical sociologist. She is a Professor Emerita (formerly Professor of Social and Public Health Sciences) at the University of Glasgow.
In 1998 she was awarded an OBE for services to medical sociology, and in 2006 she was awarded a CBE for services to social science. In 2011 she was awarded a DBE for services to science. In 2013 she was one of 12 women to receive the inaugural 'Engineering and Physical Sciences' Suffrage Science award.
